front.title: The Named Information (ni) URI Scheme: Core Syntax

abstract.t: This document defines a URI-based name form that identifies a named object via hash-based binding. The URI name form defined is intended for use in applications that need to uniquely identify resources in a location-independent way such as accessing in-network storage (DECADE), information-centric networking and more generally. The format is designed to support a strong link to the referenced object such that the referenced object may be authenticated to the same degree as the reference to it.
